Articles.Content:
Hello everyone !

My game is now crashing when I try to switch to a vessel....

I did not opened my PC in two weeks, and when I went back to it, I installed mod updates. But then unfortunately my game crash at the vessel loading.

I thought reverting mod update one by one could solve this issue, but unfortunately, it did not. So I have no more idea on why it is crashing, can someone help ?

Here the Player.log file

Game version is 1.9.1 (I have many mods, so I'm not sure that updating is a good option... I don't want to break my save file).

mod updated : from version -> to version

FMRS : 1.2.9.1 -> 1.2.9.2

ScrapYard : 2.1.0.0 -> 2.1.1.0

Science Alert realerted 1: .9.9.2 -> 1.9.9.3

Precise Node : 1.2.11.1 -> 1.2.11.2

ZeroMiniAVC : 1.1.0.1 -> 1.1.0.2

 

Thanks all for your time spent to make this game better than it already is (by helping players, making mods, etc...). Any help is much appreciated !
